item.title: A Mathematical Theory of Communication
item.description: Foundational paper that created information theory, introducing entropy and channel capacity.

item.title: On Computable Numbers, with an Application to the Entscheidungsproblem
item.description: Seminal paper introducing the concept of Turing machines and computability.
